sentence: Freshman Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) said it would be asinine' for a GOP majority to disband the panel, and Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) has called for using it to pursue unfounded theories about the Justice Department's involvement in the Jan. 6 attack,? Politico's Olivia Beavers and Kyle Cheney report.
title: Pence and RNC take radically different roads on Jan. 6
